title: The Historic route
creator_credit: United Nations Films and Yemi Lijadu
brief_description: Ethiopia has the most remarkable collection of monuments in the whole of Africa apart from the Mediterranean area, and the “historic route” is the richest in the country. The restoration and preservation of monuments as well as the development of sites are essential elements in the growth of tourism in the country’s economy.
